titleStmt.title: The character of an honest man, whether styled Whig or Tory, and his opposite the knave together with some short reflections on some passages in a late pamphlet called, The character of a popish successor, and considerations thereupon / by a lover of truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: Norton, John, 1606-1663.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
